title: Handle an Employment Verification Request
description: A mortgage lender calls HR to verify the employment and salary of a current employee.

tasks.description: Explain the company's policy is to only provide verification through a third-party service (e.g., The Work Number).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the company policy.

tasks.description: Provide the third-party service's contact information and the company's employer code to the lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the lender the necessary information to complete the verification.
